analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SuperMegaIco.fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#611-627):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens.total) (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#617-619)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(tokens.change) (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#622-624)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSoldTotal (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#626-627)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#626-627)

SuperMegaIco.autoFinishICO (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#771-783) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- capIsReached = (totalSupply == tokensCap)

SuperMegaIco.autoFinishICO (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#771-783) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- capIsReached = (totalSupply == tokensCap)
SuperMegaIco.isReachedLimit (/unique_chucks/19/0x187ac8adc20767be1635d4ad972e0c31d654f061.sol#676-679) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensCap.sub(totalSupply) == 0
